title: DRSHANKs
author: DRSHANKs
content: With most of the NFTs out there based on popular games or characters, there is no wonder that sports are the primary theme for projects building on the Metaverse. In fact, you can very soon see the first golf course in the metaverse.Metashank by Dr. Shank is a blockchain-based virtual universe built around Golf and will digitize a number of top golf courses on the blockchain, with the first one coming as soon as this year.Dr. Shank’s NFTsDr. Shank is building a state-of-the-art golf metaverse on the blockchain. Dr. Shank’s NFTs will be your pass to the MetaShank and the Shankoin is how you can buy golf tickets, golf course memberships and various other products and services in the Metashank.What is Dr. Shank’s NFT?Dr. Shank’s NFTs are digital eagles tokenized on the blockchain. Each Shank NFT represents a unique digital eagle artwork with its distinct design and characteristics. Because each NFT is unique, they cannot be mutually interchanged but can be purchased, sold and traded on the blockchain.Dr. Shank’s NFT is your pass to the Metashank, i.e. you need to own at least one Shank NFT in order to access the metaverse.Dr. Shank’s NFTs also give holders the right to automatically become eligible for ‘ETH’ rewards, which will be offered to the winning players in selected golf tournaments.The first golf course in the metaverse by Dr. ShankThe virtual world of Dr. Shank (Metashank) will be made with a focus on uniting golf fans, players and supporters and giving them a secure platform to connect and enjoy their favorite sport together.“MetaShank will be a digital world where you can escape your daily life and play your favorite sport without having to go to a physical course.”There will be golf courses, of course, where you can play alone or with friends. The first golf course is already in sight and might be launched before the end of the year. As a member, you can seamlessly access the Metashank, play in top golf courses and enjoy a never-before-seen side of the game.But, there is much more beyond golf that you can do in the Metashank. It will be like a digital replica of our world, with similar buildings, offices, pubs, cinemas and more. You can have a drink with your friends in a pub, watch a movie with your family, to name a few.As the official native token (cryptocurrency) for the Dr. Shank Universe, Shankcoin will be your primary means to buy things, products and services, such as golf course memberships, movie tickets, etc. on the Metashank.Same as Decentraland and various other metaverses being developed right now, Metashank will also eventually allow members to buy and own land in the virtual world.When will the NFT launch?According to the official website, Dr. Shank’s Eagles are landing this summer. The official website of Dr. Shank went live in April 2022, and the minting of NFTs is expected to start in the coming months.Visit drshank.io or join Dr. Shank’s official Twitter and Discord for the latest updates.
